boardgame.name: Cube Quest
KingBrick
Rumms
큐브 퀘스트
boardgame.description: Cube Quest is a dexterity game in which lightweight hollow cubic dice are flicked across custom rubber mats. Cubes that leave the mats are defeated. Play alternates until someone wins by defeating the enemy king. Cubes also risk defeat in enemy territory; if they land _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;shadow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; side up, they have been captured and must be rolled, like dice, to determine whether they escape._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The cubes have different strengths and special abilities, such as taking extra flicks, immobilizing enemy cubes, reviving lost cubes, and hiding before strategic re-positioning._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game allows for custom army building using a simple point system. Pre-battle setup involves a tactical selection of cubes worth a total of 40 points maximum to fight alongside their king. Each player also chooses how to position their cubes, creating individual attack and defense formations and structures!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 UK Games Expo Best Family/Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Game Winner

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Gamewright (GMW414) We love finding games that are easy to teach, different every time you play and challenging to master. Brothers Oliver and Gary Sibthorpe created just that type of mix with Cube Quest - a game that perfectly meshes strategy with skill. You can tell that they put many hours into perfecting this balance evidence by the unique group of cubes included within. Be sure to experiment with different mixes of cubes as well as formations. Send us pictures of your favorite formations, along with stories of thrilling moves and victories!

Gamewright (GMW414) We love finding games that are easy to teach, different every time you play and challenging to master. Brothers Oliver and Gary Sibthorpe created just that type of mix with Cube Quest - a game that perfectly meshes strategy with skill. You can tell that they put many hours into perfecting this balance evidence by the unique group of cubes included within. Be sure to experiment with different mixes of cubes as well as formations. Send us pictures of your favorite formations, along with stories of thrilling moves and victories!

Gamewright (GMW414) We love finding games that are easy to teach, different every time you play and challenging to master. Brothers Oliver and Gary Sibthorpe created just that type of mix with Cube Quest - a game that perfectly meshes strategy with skill. You can tell that they put many hours into perfecting this balance evidence by the unique group of cubes included within. Be sure to experiment with different mixes of cubes as well as formations. Send us pictures of your favorite formations, along with stories of thrilling moves and victories!

Cube Quest: £14.99 This is a brand new, shrink wrapped copy of the game. --Payments-- - PayPal is used for all online transactions - Cash is accepted for pickups from our store (see collections). --Postage (UK Only)-- -UK Shipping: £3.50 -Europe, please contact me for details Parcels are sent using MyHermes (though I reserve the right to change couriers at any time). This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Please e-mail beforehand to discuss.
New edition, with 3 mats (instead of 2), which come rolled up to avoid the folding issue from the first edition
This is a game from my own collection. I also run a UK based online boardgames store www.kingbeegames.co.uk Please check us out!

Gamewright (GMW414) We love finding games that are easy to teach, different every time you play and challenging to master. Brothers Oliver and Gary Sibthorpe created just that type of mix with Cube Quest - a game that perfectly meshes strategy with skill. You can tell that they put many hours into perfecting this balance evidence by the unique group of cubes included within. Be sure to experiment with different mixes of cubes as well as formations. A lightly played version of Cube Quest. All components are included. Note that playmats do not lay perfectly flat (see pic). I bought this game new a month ago, and the mats were like this after sitting in that box for probably 4 years. I have not taken steps to flatten the mats, such as putting weight on them for an extended period of time. Something the buyer might consider. Shipping is $5 to continental U.S..

This is the version that has 3 separate mats that are rolled. This comes from a smoke and pet free home. I ship to the United States only.
